channel.title: International News - Top 10
channel.description: Daily Top 10 International News (Reuters, AFP, BBC, The Guardian, Fox News, Independent)

item.title: Israel and Hezbollah exchange fire along border
item.description: Israel and Hezbollah militants engaged in cross-border strikes, raising fears of wider escalation in the Middle East conflict.

item.title: Ceasefire talks continue in Gaza amid humanitarian crisis
item.description: Egypt and Qatar are mediating new ceasefire talks as Gaza faces severe shortages of food, water, and medical supplies.

item.title: UN warns of escalating tensions in South China Sea
item.description: The UN called for restraint after new naval confrontations between China and the Philippines in disputed waters.

item.title: Global markets slide as US Federal Reserve signals prolonged high rates
item.description: Stocks fell worldwide after the Federal Reserve hinted interest rates will remain high well into 2026.

item.title: Russia conducts large-scale military drills with Belarus
item.description: Russia and Belarus launched joint military exercises, raising concerns among NATO allies in Eastern Europe.

item.title: India successfully tests reusable spaceplane technology
item.description: India’s space agency completed a successful trial of a reusable spaceplane, marking a major step in space innovation.

item.title: WHO raises alarm on new pandemic preparedness gaps
item.description: The World Health Organization urged countries to close gaps in pandemic preparedness after recent virus outbreaks.

item.title: US Congress struggles to avoid government shutdown
item.description: US lawmakers face a looming deadline to pass a spending bill and avoid a federal government shutdown.

item.title: Climate summit in Paris ends with renewed commitments
item.description: World leaders pledged stronger action on carbon reduction at the close of the Paris Climate Summit.

item.title: Japan and South Korea deepen defense cooperation
item.description: Japan and South Korea agreed on new defense cooperation measures amid North Korea’s continued missile launches.
